There were some other great-sounding speakers that landed last year, and even newer and more powerful models from Bose this year, but there’s just something about the brushed metal and retro-modern look of the Home model that speaks to me – it looks about as gorgeous as it sounds and it’s now down at one of the lowest prices we have tracked.
